column4: in one of the files it has will give you the cli command to launch it
dont find a howto .. just license's
it will be a readme or install file
i dont think you will find them in your home folder either
you should find them in /usr/locale/bin or /usr/bin/locale cant remember
it installed in user folders, not installed as root ...
yes thats what the /usr stands for
i can go in home/armyops and see the files installed ... but what file to execute ?
you wont find the README or INSTALL files in the home dir i dont think but feel free to look
cant find a folder releater in the usr directory .... and i am looking
try locate <gamename> and see if a read me or install file is shown than follow the path to it
if you tell #ubuntu-offtopic what your looking for in a  distro they might beable to help
